[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@acoustic-content-sdk/react-utils](./react-utils.md) &gt; [AbstractRxComponent](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent.md)

## AbstractRxComponent class

Base class for react components that compute their state via reactive streams. The life cycle methods are available via observables that fire at the appropriate time.

In the constructor of the subclass call the [connectState](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent.connectstate.md) with on observable that will compute the component state based on arbitrary information.

Methods overridden: [componentDidMount](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent.componentdidmount.md)<!-- -->, [componentWillUnmount](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent.componentwillunmount.md)<!-- -->, [componentDidUpdate](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent.componentdidupdate.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class AbstractRxComponent<P = {}, S = {}, SS = any> extends PureComponent<P, S, SS> 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(aInitial)](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent._constructor_.md) |  | Initializes the component with a current set of properties |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [done$](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent.done_.md) |  | <code>Observable&lt;any&gt;</code> | Emits when the component shuts down[componentWillUnmount](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent.componentwillunmount.md) |
|  [errors$](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent.errors_.md) |  | <code>Observable&lt;any&gt;</code> | Emits when the component produces an error |
|  [init$](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent.init_.md) |  | <code>Observable&lt;any&gt;</code> | Emits when the component initializes[componentDidMount](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent.componentdidmount.md) |
|  [props$](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent.props_.md) |  | <code>Observable&lt;Readonly&lt;P&gt;&gt;</code> | Emits when the component receives new properties or initially with the current properties[componentDidUpdate](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent.componentdidupdate.md) |

|  [connectState(aState$)](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent.connectstate.md) |  | Connects the state to the lifecycle and subscribes. It is not required - but possible - to unsubscribe, since this will happen in [componentWillUnmount](./react-utils.abstractrxcomponent.componentwillunmount.md) automatically. |
